Modern Corporate Website

Web Design, Development

Project Overview

We designed and developed a modern, responsive corporate website for a leading financial services company. The goal was to create a professional online presence that effectively communicates the company's services and values while providing an intuitive user experience.

The website features a clean, minimalist design with a focus on typography and whitespace to create a sophisticated look that aligns with the client's brand identity. We implemented custom animations and interactive elements to enhance user engagement without compromising on performance.

Client

Global Financial Services

Timeline

8 weeks

Services

UX/UI Design, Web Development, Content Strategy

Technologies

HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL

Results

  • 35% increase in time spent on site
  • 42% reduction in bounce rate
  • 28% increase in contact form submissions
  • Improved mobile user experience with 99/100 Google PageSpeed score
